text: Piraku, ivarkal (ekiptukku vantu) yusuhpitam cenru avarai nokki (‘‘misrin atipatiyakiya) ajise! Enkalaiyum enkal kutumpattaiyum (pancattin) kotumai pitittuk kontatu. (Enkalitamirunta) oru arpapporulaiye nankal kontu vantirukkirom. (Ataik kavaniyatu) enkalukku ventiya taniyattai mulumaiyaka alantu kotuttu merkontum enkalukkut tanamakavum kotuttarulviraka! Niccayamaka allah tanam ceypavarkalukku nalla piratipalan alippan'' enru kurinarkal
